tim.pacman

Class Ghost

  • java.lang.Object
    • tim.pacman.Player
      • tim.pacman.Ghost

  • public class Ghost
extends Player
    A ghost, which is implemented such that the AStar algorithm is extremely easy.
    Author:
    Timothy
